title: Rēzekne mayor not cleared to access state secrets
summary_full: Information from the State Security Service suggests that Aleksandrs Bartaševičs (Together for Latvia), Rēzekne's mayor, has been denied access to state secrets necessary for work to the  LSM.lv reports.
summary_public: Information from the State Security Service suggests that Aleksandrs Bartaševičs (Together for Latvia), Rēzekne's mayor, has been denied access to state secrets necessary for work to the  LSM.lv reports.
